summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of 55th Ave. S. from approximately 20 feet north of S. Prentice St. to S. Ryan St. and from approximately 500 feet south of Renton Ave. S. to Renton Ave. S.; and certain other streets, alleys, and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Res. No. 25457 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a Local Improvement District therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
